name: Format\TableRowSelector
description: The object for defining conditions that will cause a conditional style to be applied to a row.

properties.name: descriptor
properties.description:
A string that specifies the identifier of a specific data descriptor. All rows for this data descriptor will be selected. See .
When dataOrientation is set to horizontal, which is not the default each row displays data for one data descriptor. See .

properties.name: even
properties.description: A Boolean value when true, selects the even rows.

properties.name: odd
properties.description: A Boolean value when true, selects the odd rows.

properties.name: rowIndex
properties.description: A number that specifies a row index. The topmost row of data has an index of . The specified column is selected.
